name: User Login Authentication
description: Implement secure user login functionality with email and password
acceptanceCriteria: User can login with valid email and password
System displays error message for invalid credentials
User is redirected to dashboard after successful login
Login attempts are rate-limited after 3 failed attempts
User session is created and stored securely
businessRules: Password must be at least 8 characters
Account locks after 5 failed login attempts
Session expires after 24 hours of inactivity
